column4: hi guys i have accidentally removed my latex directory can i undo it ? i did in terminal sudo undo rm -r /usr/share/texmf-texlive/tex/latex
can any one help ? i want to undo this "sudo rm -r /usr/share/texmf-texlive/tex/latex/"
Hate to say it , but that is what the back-up thing is all about
You may be able to use Recovery Mode....
